#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int a[51],n,s;
		s = 0;
		cin>>n;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
			cin>>a[i];
			s+=a[i];
		}
		int y = s - (n*(n-1))/2;
		int c = 0;
		if(y%n==0)
		{
			int x = y/n;
			for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
			{
				if(a[i]<x+i)
					c+=(x+i-a[i]);
			}
			cout<<c<<endl;
		}
		else
			cout<<"-1"<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
